properties.name: Appartement 3 pièces dans le vieux Carouge
properties.summary: Appartement dans le vieux Carouge où il fait bon vivre  offrant une multitude de services modernes, un extraordinaire patrimoine de bars, bistrots et cafés, une architecture typique au charme sarde.
properties.space: 3 pièces avec balcon  (1) - Salon avec canapé. (2) - Chambre à coucher avec un double lit (3) - Cuisine  et une salle de bain
properties.description: Full access
properties.neighborhood_overview: Just a stone's throw from the city centre, Carouge is the Greenwich Village of Geneva. Its architecture is reminiscent of its Sardinian roots and will transport you to Southern Europe. While away many pleasant hours perusing the shops, shady terraces, crafts and antique dealers in Carouge's alleys and passageways. When night falls, experience the area's unique ambiance thanks to its many trendy bars that are known all over the city.
properties.transit: Station de tram à 2 min de l'appartement, Carouge est situé à 20 min de tram du centre ville de Genève.
properties.access: Full access
properties.host_about: I'm a Rock climber Swiss guy living in Carouge Geneva.  I love traveling around tropical countries like Brasil and Thailand... Also I spend a lot of time snowboarding, fishing, hiking in Switzerland.
properties.street: Rue de la Faïencerie, Carouge, Genève 1227, Switzerland

properties.name: Rue Saint Joseph, grand 2,5 pièces
properties.summary: Appartement de deux pièces et demi, avec poutres apparentes, avec chambre en mezzanine très lumineuse. Grande pièce à vivre salon/salle à manger, petite cuisine équipée. Salle de bain et WC séparé. Au 3ème étage sans ascenseur.
properties.space: Idéal pour un couple ou une personne seule.
properties.description: Appartement de deux pièces et demi, avec poutres apparentes, avec chambre en mezzanine très lumineuse. Grande pièce à vivre salon/salle à manger, petite cuisine équipée. Salle de bain et WC séparé. Au 3ème étage sans ascenseur. Idéal pour un couple ou une personne seule. L'appartement entier est à votre disposition avec draps et serviettes inclus, ainsi que tout ce qu'il faut pour la cuisine. Carouge, un petit air de « Greenwich Village », une touche de mystère inspiré du Marais parisien et une pincée d’atmosphère méditerranéenne: un mélange inédit pour une Cité à part. Séparée de Genève par l’Arve, petit cours d’eau aux flots parfois tumultueux, Carouge invite à la promenade et à la douce rêverie. Les maisons basses, dont certaines s’ouvrent généreusement sur des cours intérieures et des havres de verdure, donnent à la Cité une coloration méditerranéenne. properties.name: Room with private shower, 3 min from Geneva
properties.summary: Nice room with convertible sofa in the area of Carouge, with it's bathroom (shower + sink). Toilets are shared with us in the common bathroom. Beams and high ceiling give a lot of charm to the room. Central and close to several main trams and bus.
properties.space: Our flat is a new (build a year ago) flat created in an historic building in Carouge. Your room has a convertible couch where two can comfortably sleep (tested and approved :-)).  Bed sheets, pillow case, blanket and towel will be provided and the bed will be made when you arrive.  In your shower there's soap, shampoo and also toothpaste that you're welcome to use (but please don't take it with you, it's for everybody :-)).  You also have your own private shower and sink in a tiny bathroom included.  Toilets are in the main bathroom, shared with us.  The flat is located on the 5th floor, with elevator until the 4th floor (last floor must be climbed :-)).

properties.neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighborhood and soundproof windows.  We are within 3 minutes walking distance from the vibrant center of Carouge, old town, literally steps away from Geneva.  Carouge is known for it's village feel while in town. Restaurants, bars, cafes, art galleries, markets, preserved areas and decent (for Geneva :-)) night life, especially of Rue Vautier.
properties.notes: In order to respect our neighbors we kindly ask you to be careful for any unnecessary noise after midnight (door slammed or moving of furniture).
properties.transit: Well connected to two main tram lines (12 and 15), within 20 minutes from the train station.  From Geneva Airport: 30 minutes (train + tram). If you land with the airport, there's a public transport ticket distributor in the luggage claim hall, that gives travellers FREE TICKET FOR 2 HOURS (bus, boat, train, tram) within Geneva area. Don't miss out :-) From Geneva train station: tram
properties.access: You will have access to your room, living room, two bathrooms and the kitchen.  Kitchen ustensils and devices (microwave, oven, boiler) can be used if respected and cleaned after use.  Depending on your need on this regard, please ask, we'd be happy to help.
properties.interaction: We'd be happy to share with you tips and ideas on where/what and restaurants suggestions in Geneva and the neighbourhood. I filled a recommandation map with a few places we love, that you'll find at the bottom.  We have a several year experience with hosting through other platforms and decided that after having used Airbnb ourselves for traveling, we'd be happy to try hosting.  This is our main home, so unlike some airbnb, we ask you to respect our home. Doing so, you'll ensure you a nice stay with welcoming people :-)
properties.house_rules: Respectful travelers welcomed :-)

properties.name: Little cottage in Geneva's suburbs
properties.summary: Little independent cottage situated appended to a nice old villa in the suburbs of Carouge. Commodities: -2 persons comfortable sofa-bed -mattress for a 3rd person -bathroom -kitchen -wifi -swimming pool -garden -car park -nearby bus stop
properties.space: The small cottage is nearby my house in a beautiful street between Carouge and the beginning of the suburbs. It has everything needed in order to be independent (kitchen, toilet, shower, fridge, even a small table although you can eat outside on the garden's table if the weather permits it). The sofa bed is really comfortable and there is a possibility to install a mattress on the floor for a 3rd person. There is also a big garden and a beautifull swimming pool to chill out on sunny days :)

I will be around in the house probably with my dog, or nearby so I might be in the garden/swimming pool during the visitors stay. I am always available and willing to share my experiences
properties.neighborhood_overview: Carouge is an old sardinian town with lot of small shops and beautiful squares located only 10 min away from Geneva, it is the ideal place to take a break from Geneva's city centre. There are also a lot of great restaurants with terraces and nice bars. Furthermore, visitors who like nature can go for a walk or a jogging among the fields of the beautiful countryside of Veyrier and Troinex located at 5-10 min.
properties.notes: Wi-fi doesn't work well in the cottage, visitors might require to go on the garden table.
properties.transit: A bus stop is located at the end of the street which brings you in 1 min to the stop called Rondeau. From there, tramways can bring you to Carouge city centre in less than 5 min and to Geneva in less than 15 min. Taxis from Geneva airport costs approx 40 euros. The cheapest way to get here is to go to the main train station and take the tramway number 18 direction Carouge and stop at Rondeau.
properties.access: Visitors have access to the whole cottage, the garden and the swimming pool!
properties.interaction: I will be around in the house probably with my dog, or nearby so I might be in the garden/swimming pool during the visitors stay. I am always available and willing to share my experiences on Geneva or Carouge. As I grow up in the area, I could advise the visitors on the attractions of the city, the bests restaurants and places to go.
properties.house_rules: Respectful visitors are always welcome!

properties.summary: LETOIT est sous le toit d’une maison datant de 1792, sur une petite place jardin, dans une zone semi piétonne. Le toit définit entièrement l’espace de LETOIT.
properties.space: LETOIT EST UN APPARTEMENT B&B LETOIT est sous le toit d’une maison datant de 1792, sur une petite place jardin, dans une zone semi piétonne. Le toit définit entièrement l’espace de LETOIT. Sous ce toit vous trouverez un lieu sobre mais chaleureux, meublé de quelques pièces illustrant le design suisse. De temps à autre vous aurez la surprise d’y découvrir l’oeuvre d’un/une artiste contemporain-e. Dans la cuisine vous trouverez du thé, café, céréales, confiture, sucre. properties.name: Modern apartment in Carouge
properties.summary: Our bright and modern apartment is located right in the heart of one of Geneva's trendiest areas, and walking distance to the city centre. It is surrounded by great bars, cafes, restaurants and farmers markets  - and the best ice cream in Geneva!
properties.space: 1 bedroom apartment with a separate kitchen and lounge, and an underground parking space. The apartment gets loads of natural light so is bright and sunny, and has a balcony overlooking a shared garden and courtyard. The kitchen is new, light and spacious. It has all modern appliances including a dishwasher, microwave and a coffee grinder (essential!). The lounge has a TV, AMP and speakers (that you can plug your phone/ipod into), Apple TV and WIFI. There is also an office space with a desk if you need to get work done while you're here.  The bathroom is large and clean with a shower and a bathtub. Access to the bathroom is through the bedroom, but there is an extra guest toilet by the living room.  The large, light bedroom has a queen size bed and access to the balcony.  There is a coin-operated washing machine and dryer in the apartment building that guests can use. The apartment is in the centre of the old part of Carouge (which is beautiful!) and is surrounded by cafes and restaura

Access to the bathroom is through the bedroom, but there is an extra guest toilet by the living room.  The large, light bedroom has a queen size be
properties.neighborhood_overview: Carouge is the best neighbourhood in Geneva (in our opinion!). It is full of cafes, bars and restaurants as well as theatres, markets and boutique shops.  It is a 2 minute walk from our apartment to the nearest tram or bus stop. However, it is only a 30 minute walk to Lake Geneva and the Jet D'Eau, either via the beautiful old town or via lovely Plainpalais. There is also a direct tram that goes from Carouge to the United Nations as well ... it takes about 30 minutes. If needed, we can also provide bicycles, as Geneva is a great place to cycle around!   There are lots of sights near the apartment to visit including the lively Saturday morning farmers market in Carouge, the bustling Sunday morning flea market in Plainpalais, the beautiful Parc des Bastions, the historic Grande Theatre de Geneve and the stunning view over the lake from the top of Mont Saleve. There is also easy access from Carouge to the ski areas (or biking/walking areas in the summer) in the French Alps. It is about an
properties.transit: The nearest tram and bus stop is about 2 minutes' walk from the apartment and you can get trams or buses to the city centre, the lake, the UN, etc. The central train station (Gare Cornavin) is about 20 minutes by tram, and from there you can get trains all over France and Switzerland.  We prefer to walk or cycle most places - Geneva is a great place to explore on foot or 2 wheels!
properties.access: Guests will have access to the entire apartment (including the parking space) during their stay with their own set of keys.
properties.interaction: We will be happy to meet the guests on arrival to show them the apartment and provide any recommendations as required. Apart from on arrival, we will not be around but will ensure we are contactable for any queries.
properties.house_rules: All we ask is that you treat our apartment like you would your own - this is our home and we love it so please look after it!  Oh, and as it is an apartment, no smoking or pets - sorry!
properties.host_about: 34 year old female. Chartered accountant. Married and currently living in Geneva

Je serai là pour vous accueillir à votre arrivée et pour vous donner des informations sur Carouge et sur Genève en général, vous recommander les bons plans et les jolies balades. properties.neighborhood_overview: Carouge est comme une ville dans la ville - elle était jadis sous la domination du Duc de Sardaigne, ce qui lui donne une charme italien unique à Genève.  Elle est au bord de l'Arve, la rivière qui rejoint le Rhône, que l'on peut longer pour faire une jolie balade.  Carouge a aussi son marché les mercredis et samedis, ainsi qu'un marché réduit le jeudi soir.  Le quartier regorge de petites boutiques et de bons restaurants, de cafés et de bars/boîtes de nuit, tous accessibles à pied depuis l'appartement !
properties.notes: Appartement parfait pour deux personnes, ou alors deux adultes avec un ou deux enfants (1 canapé-lit double supplémentaire). 15 CHF par personne supplémentaire par nuit.
properties.transit: L'appartement est à une minute à pied de l'arrêt de tram "Ancienne", où on peut prendre le 18 qui rejoint directement le centre-ville et la gare, ou le 12, qui va également au centre-ville et qui longe la rue où se trouvent tous les grands magasins. Il est également tout près de nombreux autres arrêts de bus qui permettent de rejoindre tous les autres quartiers de Genève très facilement. Si vous voulez profiter du beau temps, vous pouvez aussi louer gratuitement des vélos pour 4 heures d'affilée à la place de l'Octroi, qui n'est pas loin de l'appartement non plus !
properties.interaction: Je serai là pour vous accueillir à votre arrivée et pour vous donner des informations sur Carouge et sur Genève en général, vous recommander les bons plans et les jolies balades. Si vous avez besoin de moi pendant votre séjour, je serai également atteignable.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Carouge is one of the municipalities of the Canton of Geneva (Switzerland) covering a surface of 2.7 km2. The highest elevation is 386 m (1,266 ft), in June 2014 the population amounts to 21,125 inhabitants and I am one of them!  I know, not everybody is interested in history, but I cannot do otherwise. During my two years living here I learned that the „Carougoise“ are very proud of their past. Here it comes:  In 1754 Carouge was „invented“ by the duke of Savoy envisioning it as a trading competitor to Geneva, which was just 2 km away, on the other side of the river Arve.  Due to religous tolerance the small hamlet quickly (18 years) grew to a prosperous town of fourthousand and became a refuge for Catholics and Jews and for Protestants tired of the puritan mentality ruling in Geneva. These days I like to stroll through the criss-crossing streets and attractive buildings develloped by Turinese achitects. The photo above I took during a guided tour through the secret gardens of Carouge

properties.neighborhood_overview: I see Carouge a little as my former Brooklyn hood - with its beautiful townhouses, its many boulangeries, cafes, artisan and design shops, art galleries, supermarkets, its farmers market, and amazing restaurants. It is definitely the neighborhood for foodies with a wide range of cuisines. Carouge is an amazing neighborhood to live in. You'll find everything you need in walking distance : a public swimming pool, a running/walking vita trail,a skating ring and hiking trail on Mont Saleve with great view on city, lake and Alps.
properties.notes: We DO NOT charge a cleaning fee or a security deposit. We HAVE a FLEXIBLE cancelation policy and  FLEXIBLE check-in/check-out.
properties.transit: Around the corner, a 2 min walk, you have a tramway stop with the two main lines 12 and 18 - the first takes you direct to the old city and to the business center (banks, shopping street, luxury shops, old city,lake, jet d'eau) the second direct to Geneva's main train station. Both in no more than 15 min.It takes 30 min to get to the UN, CERN and the Airport.
properties.access: The full apartment is for our guests to enjoy. We love healthy food and we love to cook. The kitchen is fully equipped and filled with organic food (jams,olive oil,yogurt,grains, seeds, nuts) and a great selection of teas and Italian coffee. Bathroom has organic soaps and shampoo.
properties.interaction: We just started hosting on airbnb because we love meeting new people from different places, sharing our interests, travel experiences. That's what living in NYC is all about and what we loved about it!  We won't invade your space though. We also very discreet and respectful. We are more than happy to give tips and advises.
properties.house_rules: Take care of the place and the objects as yours. Clean after yourself. The house and the surrounding are quiet so are you. No pets, no smoking inside the apartment.

Art and design lover, traveler, foody, I love to discover cities and countries through food and the arts.
I live and work between Geneva, NY and Italy

properties.name: Charming Geneva Duplex Flat on a Pedestrian Square
properties.summary: This is a charming duplex 2 bedroom apartment directly overlooking an artistic, pedestrian square, in Geneva. It is within 100 meters of many restaurants, cafés, 3 home made ice cream parlours (!) & shops - yet is well insulated and very quiet. And it's within 10 minutes direct tram ride of Geneva center - the tram stop is 50 meters away! It has wood beams, exposed stones on the walls, & terracota flooring.
properties.space: This apartment is on the 2nd and 3rd floor of a small building, overlooking the main pedestrian square in Carouge, Geneva. (Carouge is one of the nicest parts of Geneva - described as the 'Italian village'). It is decorated in traditional style, with exposed beams, exposed stones - and is on two stories. The main square has regular morning and evening food markets, however is very quiet during the evening. We have 3 home maid ice cream parlours (!) and 15 restaurants within 100 meters of our apartment!

properties.neighborhood_overview: Carouge is the artistic 'Italian' quarter of Geneva, and is full of interesting and artisanal shops. It has two main squares (the apartment overlooks the main square), and is close to parks, supermarkets (Migros and Coop), as well as a variety of restaurants, cafés, 3 home made ice cream parlours, 2 swimming pools and the post office. It is 10 minutes to the center of Geneva / lake side by tram.
properties.transit: The number 12 tram is 1 minute walk from the apartment and takes you directly into Geneva centre in 10 minutes. This tram leaves every 3 minutes!  The number 18 tram is also 1 minute walk away, and takes you to the train station and leaves every 15 minutes. There is also a taxi rank across the square from the apartment.
properties.access: Guests have access to all the apartment.
properties.interaction: We are happy to offer help in making recommendations for what to do and see in & around Geneva, and the surrounding area and regularly help our guests plan their holidays. This includes restaurant, café, home made ice cream parlours recommendations (!), together with suggestions on shops, transport, excursions and general tourism. We are also happy to help planning your vacation around the Geneva, including Chamonix and the lac Leman area.
properties.house_rules: We have a set of standard house rules and guidelines available in the apartment.
properties.host_about:
I am British, and have lived in the Geneva area for the past 23 years. I'm married with two children, aged 18 and 16, and work in marketing research.

We are an outgoing sporty family and between the 4 of us enjoy sailing, skiing, netball, horse riding, cycling & archery.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Les Acacias is a very nice neighborhood. It is very mixed and simple in the living. In a circle of 5 minutes of walking you will find 4 of the biggest supermarkets and a lot of little multicultural shops, that are opened late and on sundays. Right next to Les Acacias, you will find Carouge, with a lot of little creators' shops, boutiques and charming small cafés. Don't miss the flea market on the Plaine de Plainpalais (wednesday and saturday) and the market in Carouge (wednesday and saturday).
properties.transit: The flat is located near to Geneva's center, right next to Carouge. You can access it by car, trams (12, going directly to the center and 15, going directly to the center and to the train station) and buses. By walk, you just need 10 minutes to the University and Plainpalais, 20 minutes to the shopping center and the lake. On the opposite side you find the charming Carouge, in just 5 minutes walking distance.

The apartment is comfy, it has 2 bedrooms - one with a queen size bed and an office space and the other with a queen size bed - 1 bathroom, a living room, an open kitchen. We wanted to offer a great environment for our guests to hang out, to read books, to listen to the music. The  bedrooms are quiet, with a view on the pedestrian road and its oak and chestnut trees. The bathroom has a bathtub.
properties.description: Come stay at our apartment!Built in one of the oldest remaining farmhouses in the beautiful neighborhood of Carouge-the West Village of Geneva -it has a lot of charm.Very close to the center. The bedrooms overlook a quiet pedestrian street.They are bright,with a queen size bed, a desk,storage.You can also enjoy a comfy open living room,a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom with bathtub. properties.neighborhood_overview: We see Carouge a little as our former Brooklyn hood - with its beautiful townhouses, its many boulangeries, cafes, artisan and design shops, art galleries, supermarkets, its farmers market, and amazing restaurants. It is definitely the neighborhood for foodies with a wide range of cuisines. Carouge is an amazing neighborhood to live in. You'll find everything you need in walking distance :a public swimming pool, a running/walking vita trail, a skating ring and hiking trail on Mont Saleve with great view on city,the lake and the Alps
properties.notes: We DO NOT ask a security deposit. We HAVE a FLEXIBLE cancelation policy and  FLEXIBLE check-in/check-out. Crib available upon request. If you are 2 guests and only need one bedroom of the apartment please book through our other add: "Romantic&Cosy -1Br Apt- in Carouge-Geneva"
properties.transit: Around the corner, a 2 min walk, you have a tramway stop with the two main lines 12 and 18 - the first takes you direct to the old city and to the business center (banks, shopping street, luxury shops, old city,lake, jet d'eau) the second direct to Geneva's main train station. Both in no more than 15 min.It takes 30min to get to the UN, CERN and the Airport.
properties.access: The full apartment is for our guests to enjoy. We love healthy food and we love to cook. The kitchen is fully equipped and filled with organic food (jams,olive oil,yogurt,grains, seeds, nuts...) and a great selection of teas and Italian coffee. Bathroom has organic soaps and shampoo.
properties.interaction: We just started hosting on airbnb because we love meeting new people from different places, sharing our interests and travel experiences. That's what living in NYC is all about and what we loved about it!  We are available at any time during your stay for help, tips and advises.
properties.house_rules: Take care of the apartment and its objects as yours. Leave the apartment clean and intact. The house and the surrounding are quiet so are you. No pets, no smoking inside the apartment.

properties.neighborhood_overview: I see Carouge a little as my former Brooklyn hood - with its beautiful townhouses, its many boulangeries, cafes, artisan and design shops, art galleries, supermarkets, its farmers market, and amazing restaurants. It is definitely the neighborhood for foodies with a wide range of cuisines. Carouge is an amazing neighborhood to live in. You'll find everything you need in walking distance : a public swimming pool, a running/walking vita trail,a skating ring and hiking trail on Mont Saleve with great view on city, lake and Alps.
properties.notes: We DO NOT ask a  security deposit. We HAVE a FLEXIBLE cancelation policy and  FLEXIBLE check-in/check-out. Crib available upon request.
properties.transit: Around the corner, a 2 min walk, you have a tramway stop with the two main lines 12 and 18 - the first takes you direct to the old city and to the business center (banks, shopping street, luxury shops, old city,lake, jet d'eau) the second direct to Geneva's main train station. Both in no more than 15 min.It takes 30min to get to the UN, CERN and the Airport.
properties.access: The full apartment is for our guests to enjoy. We love healthy food and we love to cook. The kitchen is fully equipped and filled with  organic food (jams,olive oil,yogurt,grains, seeds, nuts...) and a great selection of teas and Italian coffee. Bathroom has organic soaps and shampoo.
properties.interaction: We just started hosting on airbnb because we love meeting new people from different places, sharing our interests, travel experiences. That's what living in NYC is all about and what we loved about it!   We also very discreet and respectful. We are more than happy to give tips and advises.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Carouge was designed by Italian architects and has retained its Latin charm to this day. Because of its convenient location right by the centre of Geneva andon the river Arve it was a popular place for bridges even in the 1st century BC.  Many of the neo-classical houses and the inner courtyard gardens are well preserved and have been converted to restaurants, fashion boutiques, workshops, ateliers and antique stores. It is full of charm and character with numerous art, music and theatre events. The city has invested heavily in widening the pavements, limiting traffic, planting wild meadows, trees and even vegetables, installing benches and numerous playgrounds making it perhaps the most pleasant and family friendly, yet interesting and happening place in Geneva.  During Calvinist times when alcohol was prohibited in Geneva, many bars and restaurants sprang up in Carouge and today it remains one of the nicest parts of time for going out in the evening.  At the same time it only takes 2
properties.notes: My two young children will want to come and say hello but will be away all day and will be playing in their playroom when they get home. They sleep through the night and will not be disturbed if you make a lot of noise. This flat and the whole area is very child friendly. I have all the things that children might need here for you including lots of toys!, so feel free to bring your children and babies! I can tell you where the best child friendly places to go in Geneva and Carouge are. The area is full of playgrounds. However the room is also perfect for a couple, friends or a single person.
properties.transit: This location if fabulous. You are right in Carouge which is the most aesthetically attractive and interesting areas of Geneva. All the wonderful boutiques, cafes, bars, restaurants, exhibitions, theatres etc. in Carouge are a short walk from the flat. You can also walk to the centre of Geneva or to the station in 20-25 min. There is a tram stop 3 min away (no. 15, stop J.-Pictet-Thellusson). On the 15 tram it is 10 min to Cornavin station (the main railway station in Geneva) and 5 min to Plainpalais. The flat is 8-10 min walk from the 12 and 15 trams which take you to the lake, the old town etc in 10 min. The pavements are very wide in Carouge so it's easy to get around with a pram or wheelchair. There is a multi-story parking place 5 min walk from the flat. There are plenty of supermarkets within 10 min and convenient stores / boulangeries 3 min from the flat.
properties.access: You have your private double room with the superkingsize bed (that is big enough for two adults - and even plus child!) and there is also a comfortable single sofabed in the room  and I can also put a cot there too if needed. You have access to a large bathroom with a big bath and a very good, strong shower. You also have (shared) use of the fully equipped kitchen, dining table with four chairs and small balcony with a table and two chairs. There is plenty of space to put all your things including storage space for suitcases etc.
properties.interaction: I am usually there and if not can come and see you when you check in. My two young children are at school and kindergarten all day. We have dinner at 6pm and the kitchen will be left clean for your use from 7pm (and all day before). I will provide coffee and tea and I can also provide breakfast for CHF 10 per person. I can give you maps and lots of info about Carouge and Geneva.
properties.house_rules: Please take your shoes off strictly in the porch and don´t go over the line with shoes even for a minute! Thank you! It keeps the place really clean.. I provide slippers if requested. You can smoke on the balcony when there is no washing out there!
properties.host_about: I'm half English, half German and have lived and worked in lots of different countries. I speak English, German, French and some Russian and Japanese. I think that a great aspect of Airbnb is that people from all different countries and walks of life can meet and widen each other's perspectives.

With its unique architecture, small squares with beautiful fountains, huge number of restaurants and cafes, boutiques and studios, Carouge feels a world away from Geneva. Whether here for business or pleasure, it is a wonderful place to wander and explore. Don't miss the farmer's market Wednesday and Saturday mornings.

I'm a 43 years old man based in Geneva.

Hosting people from around the world, sharing my place, conversations, experiences and getting to know them is something I truly like. I treat everyone that visit my place as a family member while giving them the intimacy and space they need.

I love making incredible vegetable smoothies in the morning, eating healthy living food, great wines, going out with friends, reading and practicing outdoor sports like running, swimming, mountain trekking and snowboarding as well as going to the gym. 

In summary I'm a pretty easy going and positive guy who believes that everything that happens to me is the best possible thing that can happen. I love spending quality time with my friends and making new ones.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Vivre à Carouge, c'est vivre dans le jardin de la ville de Genève. Une agréable façon d'habiter au centre ville! Carouge est une petite ville aux origines sardes. Elle est chaleureuse et festive, elle regorge de places charmantes et de rues vivantes, où l'artisanat de qualité côtoie les terrasses originales. On y trouve des bistros vegan, sans gluten et lactose, mais aussi des brasseries traditionnelles, des boulangeries artisanales, des bars à vin, etc. La culture occupe une grande place à Carouge. Un cinéma indépendant, des espaces d'art, un musée et de nombreux théâtres. De superbes ballades vous y attendent aussi. Le long de l'Arve pour découvrir la ville est aboutir au Rhône ou dans le bois de Pinchat, où l'on peut y voir des animaux, faire un Parcourt Vita et se sentir à la campagne. Vous pouvez aussi y louer gratuitement des vélos... Carouge jouxte la ville de Genève. Il suffit de quelques minutes, en tram ou même à pied, pour être au centre de Genève.
properties.transit: Vous êtes à 1 minute de la Place d'Armes, où circulent les bus et les trams. La ligne 12 vous mènera au centre de Genève pour votre shopping et à sa vieille ville. La ligne 18 vous connectera sans changement à la gare. Elle traverse Genève et vous portera même jusqu'au CERN. Tous les lieux de tourisme sont rapidement accessibles en transports publics ((URL HIDDEN) Depuis l'aéroport: 7min en train jusqu'à Genève Cornavin, puis 15 min en tram jusqu'à la Place d'Armes à Carouge, et pour finir 1min à pied jusqu'à la porte de mon appartement!

properties.neighborhood_overview: Carouge was designed by Italian architects and has retained its Latin charm to this day. Because of its convenient location right by the centre of Geneva andon the river Arve it was a popular place for bridges even in the 1st century BC.  Many of the neo-classical houses and the inner courtyard gardens are well preserved and have been converted to restaurants, fashion boutiques, workshops, ateliers and antique stores. It is full of charm and character with numerous art, music and theatre events. The city has invested heavily in widening the pavements, limiting traffic, planting wild meadows, trees and even vegetables, installing benches and numerous playgrounds making it perhaps the most pleasant and family friendly, yet interesting and happening place in Geneva.  During Calvinist times when alcohol was prohibited in Geneva, many bars and restaurants sprang up in Carouge and today it remains one of the nicest parts of time for going out in the evening. properties.notes: My two young children will want to come and say hello but will be away all day and will be playing in their playroom when they get home. They sleep through the night and will not be disturbed if you make a lot of noise. This flat and the whole area is very child friendly. I have all the things that children might need here for you including lots of toys!, so feel free to bring your children and babies! I can tell you where the best child friendly places to go in Geneva and Carouge are. The area is full of playgrounds. However the room is also perfect for a couple, friends or a single person.
properties.transit: This location if fabulous. You are right in Carouge which is the most aesthetically attractive and interesting areas of Geneva. All the wonderful boutiques, cafes, bars, restaurants, exhibitions, theatres etc. in Carouge are a short walk from the flat. You can also walk to the centre of Geneva or to the station in 20-25 min. There is a tram stop 3 min away (no. 15, stop J.-Pictet-Thellusson). On the 15 tram it is 10 min to Cornavin station (the main railway station in Geneva) and 5 min to Plainpalais. The flat is 8-10 min walk from the 12 and 15 trams which take you to the lake, the old town etc in 10 min. The pavements are very wide in Carouge so it's easy to get around with a pram or wheelchair. There is a multi-story parking place 5 min walk from the flat. There are plenty of supermarkets within 10 min and convenient stores / boulangeries 3 min from the flat.
properties.access: You have your private double room with the superkingsize bed (that is big enough for two adults - and even plus child!) and I can also put a cot or single mattress in the room. There is no charge for children. You have access to a large bathroom with a big bath and a very good, strong shower. You also have (shared) use of the fully equipped kitchen, dining table with four chairs and small balcony with a table and two chairs. There is plenty of space to put all your things including storage space for suitcases etc.
properties.interaction: I am usually there and if not can come and see you when you check in. My two young children are at school and kindergarten all day. We have dinner at 6pm and the kitchen will be left clean for your use from 7pm (and all day before). I will provide coffee and tea and I can also provide breakfast for CHF 10 per person. I can give you maps and lots of info about Carouge and Geneva.
properties.house_rules: Please take your shoes off strictly in the porch and do not enter the apartment with shoes even for one minute! Thank you! I provide slippers if requested. You can smoke on the balcony. There are no other rules!
properties.host_about: I'm half English, half German and have lived and worked in lots of different countries. I speak English, German, French and some Russian and Japanese. I am 45 and have a daughter who is 4 and a son who is nearly 2. I work in International marketing and love architecture, design, creative arts, property development and travelling. I have lived in Carouge, Geneva for 3 years and I am happy to give you lots of info on what to see and do here.  I think that a great aspect of Airbnb is that people from all different countries and walks of life can meet and widen each other's perspectives.
